explanation: The bug was in the rounding-up formula: the line ans = N + a - 1 incorrectly computes the next multiple of 5 when a == 4 (e.g., N=54 gives 57 instead of 55). I replaced it with ans = N + 5 - a so that when remainder a>=3 we correctly move up to the next water station (add 5-a). No retrieved diff directly applied; this is a direct mathematical correction.
